Translations.Text: En des nom da DI Gracious Merciful
Lauxd est DI Lord univers
Gracious Merciful
Mastr Tag Judgment
Vi sol ni worship Vi sol ni pet help
Direkt us en dekstr path
path de those Vi ben; ne de those ind wrath nor strayers
M
This scripture est infallible; beacon por des righteous
who kred en unseen observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) el our provisions al them ili don charity
Ili kred en ki revealed vi en ki revealed antaux vi regard Hereafter ili est absolutely nepr
These est direkt per their Lord these est winners
As por those disbelieve est des sam them; whether vi avert them ne avert them ili ne kred
DI SIGEL their MENS their auxd their OKUL VUAL. Ili incurred severe retribution
Tiam tie est those dir Ni kred en DI Last Tag while ili ne est believers
En pen tromp DI those kred ili nur tromp sen perceiving
En their mens tie est disease Consequently DI eg their disease Ili incurred painful retribution por their mensog
When ili told ne commit evil ili dir ni est righteous
En fakt, ili est evildoers ili ne perceive
When ili told Kred popol kred ili dir Shall ni kred like mistifik kred? En fakt, est ili est mistifik ili ne kon
When ili meet believers ili dir Ni kred when sol their diabl ili dir Ni est kun vi; ni nur mok
DI mok them PLUMB them their transgressions blundering
est ili acxet straying guidance! Such komerc neniam prosper nor do ili ricev any guidance
Their ekzempl est those start fajr tiam gxi komenc shed light them DI sorb for their light las them en darkness, unable seg
Surd dumb blind; ili fail return
Another ekzempl rainstorm cxiel en tie est darkness tondr fulm. Ili put their fingr their orel evade death! DI est fully aware da disbelievers
Fulm preskaux snatches for their eyesight. When gxi lights them ili mov forward kaj when gxi torn dark ili star ankoraux. Se DI vol Li can sorb for their auxd their eyesight! DI est Omnipotent
O popol worship nur your Lord - Unu kre vi kaj those antaux vi - Ke vi sav
Unu far ter habitable vi cxiel struktur. Li send cxiel akv produkt all kinds da frukt your sustenance. Vi ne set idols rival DI tuj ke vi kon
Vi hav any dub regarding ki ni revealed our servant tiam produkt 1 sura like these vok your own witnesses DI vi est truthful
Se vi ne do this - Vi neniam do this - Tiam beware da Hellfire fuel est popol rok; gxi awaits disbelievers

Don bon news those kred plumb righteous life ke ili hav gxarden flu streams When proviz kun provision frukt therein ili dir This est ki est proviz por us previously! Tiel ili don allegorical descriptions. Ili hav pur spouses therein ili abide therein forever

DI NE shy FOR citing any kind da allegory tiny MOSKIT greater. As por those who kred ili kon gxi est truth their Lord As por those disbelieve ili dir Ki did DI mean such allegory? Li misleads many thereby direkt many thereby! Li neniam misleads thereby escept des wicked
who violate di covenant pledging uphold gxi sever ki DI komand joined commit evil These est losers
Kiel vi disbelieve DI when vi dead Li est don vi life tiam Li puts vi death tiam Li brings vi dors life tiam Him vi ultimately return
Li est Unu kre vi cxio sur ter tiam torn cxiel perfekt 7 univers therein Li est fully aware da all ajx

(Recall your Lord dir al angxel mi ej representative temporary di) Ter. Ili dir do gxi Vi ej therein unu stern evil therein shed sang while ni kant Your lauxd glor Vi uphold Your absolut auxtoritat? Li dir mi kon ki vi ne kon
Li instru Adam all nom tiam prezent them angxel dir Don me nom de these vi est dekstr
Ili dir Vi glor ni ne hav knowledge which Vi instru us. Vi est Omniscient Sagx
Li dir O Adam tell them their nom. When li told them their nom Li dir mi ne tell vi mi kon sekret de heavens ter? Mi kon ki vi deklar ki vi conceal
When ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam ili fal prostrate Satan; li rifuz est tro arrogant kaj disbeliever
Ni dir O Adam viv your wife en Paradise mangx therefrom generously vi placx ne approach this arb lest vi pek
Diabl duped them kauxz their eviction therefrom Ni dir Ir down enemies de 1 another Sur Ter est your habitation provision por awhile
Tiam Adam ricev el his Lord vort whereby Li redeemed him! Li est Redeemer Merciful
Ni dir Ir down therefrom all da vi! When guidance ven vi Me those sekv My guidance ne hav tim nor vol ili grieve
As por those disbelieve reject our revelations ili est dwellers Infer wherein ili abide forever
O Infan Israel memor My komplez mi bestowed vi fulfill your part covenant ke mi fulfill My part covenant reverence Me
Vi kred en ki mi revealed herein konfirm ki vi hav; est 1 reject gxi! Ne meti for My revelations cheap prez observ Me
Ne confound truth falsehood nor shall vi conceal truth knowingly
Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) bow down those bow down
Vi exhort popol Do est righteous while forges yourselves vi leg scripture? Vi ne kompren
Vi streb help steadfastness Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! This est difficult ja ne tial por des reverent
who kred ili meet their Lord ke al Him ili ultimately return
O Infan Israel memor My komplez mi bestowed vi ke mi ben vi plur than any ali popol
Beware da tag when ne anim avail another anim ne intercession ne akcept ransom pag nor can anyone help
Recall ti ni sav vi Pharaoh's popol inflicted vi mav persecution slaying your fil sxpar your daughters! Ke exacting test your Lord
Recall ti ni part mar vi; ni sav vi dron Pharaoh's popol your okul
sed when ni summoned Moses 40 nokt vi worshipped calf his absence torn wicked
Ankoraux ni pardon vi thereafter ke vi est appreciative
Recall ti ni don Moses scripture statut libr ti vi direkt

Recall ti Moses dir al his popol O my popol vi wronged your anim worshipping calf Vi pent your Creator. Vi kill your egos. This est put vi sight your Creator. Li did redeem vi. Li est Redeemer Merciful
Recall ti vi dir O Moses ni ne kred ni seg DI physically. Consequently fulm strik vi as vi rigard
Ni tiam revived vi vi mort ti vi est appreciative
(Ni shaded vi nub Sinai) send down vi manna quails Mangx bon ajx ni proviz por vi Ili ne dolor us (per ribel ili nur dolor their own anim)
Recall ni dir Enter this town vi trov as many provisions vi like Just enter gate humbly trakt popol nicely! Ni tiam forgive your pek increase rekompenc por des pi
wicked among them port ordon ordon don them. Consequently ni send down transgressors condemnation cxiel their wickedness
Recall Moses streb akv his popol! Ni dir Strik rok your stab. Whereupon 12 risort sxpruc out therefrom members each gent kon their own akv. Mangx trink di provisions ne roam ter corruptingly

Recall ti vi dir O Moses ni ne long toler unu kind da food Vok your Lord produkt us such earthly crops fab kukum ajl lentils cep. Li dir vi wish substitute ke which inferior ke which est est bon? Ir down Egypt vi trov ki vi pet Ili incurred condemnation humiliation disgrace brought upon themselves wrath el DI! This because ili rejected di revelations killed prophets unjustly! This ili disobeyed transgressed
Surely those kred those est Jewish Christians konvert; anyone who (1) kred en DI (2) kred en Last Tag (3) plumb righteous life ricev their recompense their Lord Ili hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
Ni far covenant vi as ni raised Mount Sinai vi Vi uphold ki ni don vi strongly memor its kontent ti vi sav
Vi torn thereafter kaj gxi est por di grace vi His mercy vi doomed
Vi kon pri those among vi desecrated Sabbath. Ni dir al them Est vi as despicable as apes
Ni set them ekzempl their generaci tro subsequent generaci enlightenment por des righteous
Moses dir al his popol DI komand vi ofer heifer. Ili dir Est vi mok us? Li dir "DI forbid mi behave like ignorant unu
Ili dir Vok your Lord montr us which unu. Li dir Li dir sxi est heifer est nek tro old nor tro jun; intermediate agx! Nun port ki vi komand do
Ili dir Vok your Lord montr us her kolor. Li dir Li dir sxi est flav heifer hel kolor placx beholders
Ili dir Vok your Lord montr us which 1! heifers rigard alike al us DI testament ni direkt
Li dir Li dir sxi est heifer neniam humiliated plowing land akv crops liber el any blemish Ili dir Nun vi brought truth. Ili finally ofer her this lengthy reluctance
Vi killed anim tiam disput yourselves. DI est expose ki VI PEN conceal
Ni dir Strik (viktim) part heifer.) Ke when DI brought viktim dors life montr vi His sign ti vi kompren
Despite this your kor hard like rok eben harder tie est rok river sxpruc out. Others krak release gentle streams ali rok cringe reverence DI! DI EST NENIAM unaware DE anything VI do
Vi expect them kred as vi do when kelk da them uz auxd vort DI tiam distort gxi plen kompren thereof deliberately

Kaj when ili meet believers ili dir Ni kred when ili get together each ali ili dir ne inform (believers) information don al vi DI lest vi proviz them support por their argument your Lord Vi ne kompren
Ili ne kon ke DI kon cxio ili conceal cxio ili deklar
Among them est gentiles ne kon scripture hearsay tiam assume ti ili kon gxi
Do ve al those distort scripture their own man tiam dir This est ki DI revealed streb cheap sxtof gajn! Ve al them por such distortion ve al them por their illicit gajn
Kelk dir Infer ne tusx us lim numer tag. Dir Hav vi pren such pledge DI! - DI NENIAM ROMP His pledge - Vi dir DI ki vi ne kon
Ja those earn pek igx surrounded their evil work est dwellers Infer; ili abide gxi forever
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili est dwellers Paradise; ili abide gxi forever

Ni far covenant Infan Israel Vi ne worship DI. Vi honor your parents regard relativ orf poor Vi trakt popol amicably. Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat.) vi torn escept a few da vi vi igx averse
Ni far covenant vi vi ne shed your sang nor shall vi evict each ali your hejm! Vi agreed bor witness

here vi est killing each ali evicting kelk da vi el their hejm band them sinfully maliciously! Eben when ili surrendered vi postul ransom them. Evicting them prohibited vi en des 1 met. Vi kred en part de scripture Do kaj disbelieve en part? Ki est retribution por those among vi who this escept humiliation en this life far mav retribution Tag Resurrection? DI EST NENIAM unaware DE anything VI do
est ili acxet this lowly life Hereafter Consequently retribution neniam commuted them nor can ili help

Ni don Moses scripture subsequent him ni send ali messengers ni don Jesus fil Mary profound mirakl supported him Holy Spirit. Est gxi ne fakt ke cxiu temp messenger ir vi anything vi disliked your ego kauxz vi est arrogant? Kelk da them vi rejected kelk da them vi killed
Kelk dir Our mens est far up Instead gxi est curse DI consequence their disbelief ke keeps them el kred escept por a few da them

When this scripture ven them DI ecx gxi agrees konfirm ki ili hav ecx ili uz prophesy its advent when ili talked kun disbelievers when their own prophecy ven pas ili disbelieved therein! Di condemnation tiel aflikt disbelievers

Miserable ja est ki ili vend their anim por - rejecting these revelations DI sheer resentment ti DI bestow His grace whomever Li chooses His servants! Consequently ili incurred wrath wrath. disbelievers incurred humiliating retribution

When ili told Vi kred en these revelations DI ili dir Ni kred nur en ki send down us. Do ili disbelieve subsequent revelations ecx gxi est truth their Lord eben gxi konfirm ki ili hav! Dir Why tiam vi kill di prophets vi est believers
Moses ir vi profound mirakl vi worshipped calf his absence vi torn wicked

Ni far covenant vi as ni raised Mount Sinai vi dir Vi uphold commandments ni don vi strongly auxskult Ili dir Ni auxd ni disobey Their kor igx filled adoration calf their disbelief! Dir Miserable ja est ki your faith dikt vi vi hav any faith
Dir Se abode Hereafter rezerv vi DI exclusion all ali popol tiam vi long death vi est truthful
Ili neniam long gxi ki their man send for. DI est fully aware da DES wicked

En fakt, vi trov them plej covetous de life; eben plur tial than idol worshipers. Unu de them wishes viv 1000 jar. this ne sxpar him any retribution ne materi kiel long li viv. DI est seer DE CXIO ILI do
dir Anyone opposes Gabriel kon ti li brought this (Quran) into your kor en accordance kun di testament konfirm previous scriptures proviz guidance bon news believers
Anyone opposes DI His angxel His messengers Gabriel Michael kon ti DI opposes disbelievers
Ni send vi such klar revelations nur wicked vol reject them
Est gxi ne fakt when ili far covenant pledge keep gxi kelk da them cxiam disregard gxi? En fakt, plej de them ne kred
Tuj messenger el DI ven them ecx li pruv konfirm their own scripture kelk followers scripture (Jud Christians Muslims) disregard di scripture their dors as ili neniam hav any scripture

Ili pursued ki diabl instru Solomon's kingdom. Solomon tamen ne est disbeliever diabl est disbelievers. Ili instru popol sorcery kaj which send down 2 angxel Babel Haroot Maroot. These 2 ne divulge such knowledge pint This est test Vi ne abuse such knowledge. popol uz gxi en such evil schemes as romp de marriages! Ili neniam harm anyone vol DI. Ili tiel lern ki dolor them ne ki benefits them ili kon plen put ke whoever practices witchcraft ne hav akci Hereafter Miserable ja est ki ili vend their anim se ili nur kon
Ili kred plumb righteous life rekompenc el DI est far put ili nur kon
(O vi kred ne dir Raa ena est our shepherd Instead vi dir Unzurna watch us) auxskult disbelievers incurred painful retribution
Nek disbelievers followers scripture nor idol worshipers wish seg any blessings ven vi your Lord Di dusx His blessings whomever Li chooses DI POSED infinite grace
When ni abrogate any mirakl kauxz gxi forges ni produkt put mirakl je malplej egal 1. Vi ne recognize ti DI Do est Omnipotent
Vi ne recognize ti DI Do posed kingship de heavens ter; ke vi hav neniom DI your Lord Mastr
Vi wish postul de your messenger ki postul de Moses en des preter? Anyone chooses disbelief belief hav ver strayed dekstr path

Many followers scripture would rather vid vi revert disbelief tuj ke vi kred. This est due al jealousy their part truth igx evident al them. Vi pardon them las them DI issues His judgment DI est Omnipotent
Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat). Any bon vi send for your anim vi trov gxi DI. DI est seer DE CXIO VI do
Kelk dir Ne 1 enter Paradise escept Jud Christians! Such est their wishful opini Dir Montr us your proof vi est dekstr
JA those submit absolutely DI SOL while konduk righteous life RICEV their recompense their Lord ILI HAV nothing TIM nor VOL ILI grieve
Jud dir Christians ne hav basis while Christians dir Jud ne hav basis. ambaux them leg scripture! Such est utterances de those ne posed knowledge. DI testament JUGX them TAG Resurrection their DISPUT

Who evil than those est boycott di masjids His nom commemorated kontribu their desertion? These ne enter therein escept fearfully. Ili sufer en this life humiliation sufer Hereafter terrible retribution
Al DI aparten orient okcident; wherever vi ir tie est presence DI! DI est Omnipresent Omniscient
Ili dir DI begotten fil! Li glor; neniam! Al Him aparten cxio heavens ter; all est subservient al Him
Initiator de heavens ter hav anything done Li simply dir al Est gxi est
Those ne posed knowledge dir nur DI parol al us kelk mirakl ven al us! Others them uttered simil utterances; their mens est simil! Ni manifest mirakl those ating certainty
Ni send vi truth bearer bon news tro warner. Vi ne est answerable those incur Infer
Nek Jud nor Christians akcept vi vi sekv their religi. Dir di guidance est prav guidance. vi acquiesce their wishes knowledge vi ricev vi ne trov ally supporter help vi DI
Those ricev scripture kon gxi as gxi kon kred en this! As por those disbelieve ili est losers
O Infan Israel memor My komplez mi bestowed vi ke mi ben vi plur than any ali popol
Beware da tag when ne anim help another anim neni ransom ne akcept intercession est util ne 1 help
Recall ti Abraham put test his Lord nepr ordon li fulfilled them! (Di) dir mi appointing vi imam popol. Li dir ankaux my descendants? Li dir My covenant ne include transgressors
(Ni rendered shrine Ka aba) focal pint popol sekur sanctuary. Vi uz Abraham's shrine as prayer dom. Ni komision Abraham Ismail Vi purify My dom those vizit those who viv tie those bow prostrate

Abraham pregx My Lord far this peaceful land proviz its popol frukt! Proviz por those kred en DI Last Tag. (Di) dir mi do gxi ankaux proviz por those disbelieve! Mi let them gxu temporarily tiam commit them retribution Infer miserable destiny
As Abraham raised fundament shrine together kun Ismail (ili pregx Our Lord akcept this el us! Vi est Hearer Omniscient)
Our Lord far us submitters al Vi el our descendants let tie est community submitters Vi! Instru us rites our religi redeem us! Vi est Redeemer Merciful
Our Lord raise among them messenger recite them Your revelations instru them scripture wisdom purify them! Vi est Almighty Sagx
Who forsake religi Abraham 1 who mistifik his own anim? Ni chosen him en this mond en Hereafter li est kun des righteous
When his Lord dir al him Submit li dir mi submit Lord univers
Ankaux Abraham exhorted his infan do sam kaj tial did Jacob O my infan DI pint religi vi ne mort submitters
Hav vi witnessed Jacob his death lit; li dir al his infan Ki vol vi worship post mi mort? Ili dir Ni worship your di; di de your patr Abraham Ismail Isaac; 1 di! Al Him ni est submitters
Such est community preter. Ili est responsible ki ili earned vi est responsible ki vi earned Vi ne est answerable anything ili done
Ili dir Vi est Jewish Christian direkt. Dir Ni sekv religi Abraham! - monotheism - Li neniam est idol worshiper

dir Ni kred en DI en ki send us en ki send down Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs; en ki don al Moses Jesus all prophets el their Lord Ni ne far distinction any da them. Al Him sol ni est submitters
Ili kred as vi do tiam ili direkt. Sed se ili turn tiam ili est en opposition DI testament SXPAR VI their opposition LI est Hearer Omniscient
Such est di sistem sistem est put than di? Him sol ni worship
Dir Do vi argue us DI when Li est our Lord your Lord Ni est responsible our deeds vi est responsible por your deeds. Al Him sol ni devoted
Vi dir ti Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs est Jewish Christian Dir vi kon put than DI? Who evil than unu conceals testimony li est lern DI? DI EST NENIAM unaware DE anything VI do
Ke est community preter. Ili est responsible ki ili earned vi est responsible ki vi earned Vi ne est answerable anything ili did
